documents.document: Nae words to describe how good it is being a Celtic fan right now #historyinthemaking
So refreshing to hear a calm, collected and honest post fight interview from a boxer! #CarlFrampton 👏👏👏
Cannot wait for the trilogy 🙌🙌🙌🙌
What a fight again! 117-14 Santa Cruz. Bring on number 3!!!
This is so fucking close
What a difference from the last fight, that's 3 zip Santa Cruz
This is gony be a cracker this fight
Really fancy Santa Cruz but I really can't decide what tae lump on 🙈🙈
Thought he was a goner there 😳😳
What a knockout, holy fuck 😳😳😳😳
Is it just me that fancies Santa Cruz tonight? 🙈🙈
1st time out in Bathgate in nearly 2 year, definitely a reason for that length a absence 😂
That Derby own goal 😂😂😂
@gazwilliamson they had it in a tiny tent at Mint last year and it wasn't as good. If the line up is shite I'll be selling mines
@gazwilliamson they will aye, that'll sell out straight away as well. You'd think Elrow was the only decent night in Glasgow all year 😂
Everycunt pure freaking out about Elrow, it's almost like there's nae other decent nights on every single weekend 🙄🙄
@danielmurray67 if it is it'll be easy enough to flog them to some mug who's only interested in some confetti and blow up toys 😂
@danielmurray67 what a bastard that 🙄😂. Better no be a shite lineup now
Fucking £80 for 2 Elrow tickets and it's sold out already 😂😂😂
Ed Sheeren's new song and the video for it would bring a tear to yer eye man. Getting old is pure shite
@vikkiferrier @ssgarrity the whole a Scotland has 😂
@vikkiferrier @ssgarrity I mean either or, any advice helps cause we're a pair a indecisive bastards 😂😂
@vikkiferrier @ssgarrity fuck, can ye no go earlier and tell us what it's like? 😂😂
@vikkiferrier 😂😂, beats any yer sci-if shite any day 🙈. @ssgarrity should decide based on our opinions and our opinions alone tbh 😂
@vikkiferrier depends what ye like, real life or kid on real life. It was never going to be as good as the first 🙈, no got the shock factor
@vikkiferrier @chrislammie aye but the T2 reviews haven't been great either 🙈. In the end I'll be going where I'm telt anyway 😂
@vikkiferrier @chrislammie you're no kidding 😂. It looks weird as fuck aye but it seems like a thriller which is right up our street
@vikkiferrier @chrislammie Sam has convinced me to use our vouchers on that before T2, better no be shite 😳
Cannot believe we've made it 🙈🙈🙈. This helps heal the wound of 2013 😂 @SkySportsNFL #RiseUp
@gazmitchell92 be some laugh that 😂
@gazmitchell92 fucking buzzing 😂😂. If the steelers win later you need to take a sicky for the SB, me and Pratt will be rolling about 🙈😂
YASSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!!! Super Bowl bound now surely 🙌🙌🙌🙌 @AtlantaFalcons @SkySportsNFL #GBvsATL #RiseUp
@gazmitchell92 about 90% away 😂😂. Stop at the start of this half and I'm starting to celebrate 🙈
WHAT A FUCKING START 🙌🙌🙌🙌 @AtlantaFalcons #GBvsATL #RiseUp
@WilliamHill Boswell #LastActionHero
The nerves man 🙈🙈🙈 @AtlantaFalcons #GBvsATL #RiseUp
Nothing better than having a few beers watching the scores on a Saturday
@chrislammie your life will be a fucking misery within 6 months. Nightmare journeys to spend the day listening to an even worse accent
Holy fuck man, what an incredible game that was 😳😳😳 #DALvsGB #NFLPlayoffs
Great fight and great judging
@DarynPhillips honestly mate, fuck knows! Good luck scoring that 😂😂
No matter what way it goes, there can be no argument. Draw for me
What a fucking fight 😳😳😳😳😳
@DarynPhillips only thing you've no got is happening 😂. Some fight
@DarynPhillips rounds ye got? This is points bound. I'd have City before man utd the mora 🙈
@DarynPhillips biggest giveaway by the bookies this year that 😳. I honestly wouldn't touch that game, City at evens is yer bet
@DarynPhillips fuck sake, some odds that! Wish to fuck I'd seen they odds 😂. No even worth the bet that
@DarynPhillips aye fucking sure a have 😂. No even looked at the odds for the boxing the night at all. Lump the mora, money to be won
@EastonDaz @GrantEaston1 some talent! Bit like me telling ye about some Kazakh nobody a few years back 🙄😂
@DarynPhillips I've turned over now, game over. No like ye to lump 🙈😂. I don't fancy a knock out but I wouldn't be lumping against it
@DarynPhillips NFL is too good to miss 😂. I'd be shocked if he never won tbh but I reckon it's points bound
@DarynPhillips fuck up 😂😂. Switching between that and the NFL, that last fight seemed a topper! I'll be watch the DeGale fight though
@DarynPhillips correct, she's more mental than me though 😂😂
Something weirdly hilarious about yer wee sister coming in blotto and causing it 😂😂😂
Couldn't be happier, roll on the NFC championship game! #RiseUp
Aw man, this offence 😍😍😍😍 #SEAvsATL #RiseUp @SkySportsNFL
What a half that was, more of the same please! #SEAvsATL #RiseUp
Don't know whether this is excitement or nerves 🙈 #SEAvsATL #RiseUp
Nothing would give me greater satisfaction than the Chinese fucking ravaging the premiership 😂😂. Reap what ye sow ya cunts
Not an hour of the day goes by where I'm not wishing I was at @TheBPMFestival . Wit a comedown
Some laugh it's gony be no making it to a 48 team World Cup and spending the summer getting blitzed, shouting on San Marino against England
@WilliamHill Hauschka #LastActionHero
Imagine 'sweating' over the fitness a Joe fucking Garner man. Wit a worry it must be, who's gony get the bookings now?!

I'm all for more games against them on Hogmonay, what a way to end a year and lead into a new one 👌
All kidding aside, that was a fantastic game of football today. Must have been a fantastic watch for a neutral
@danielmurray67 don't get yer hopes up too much

@adelante34 need to force yourself to drink it or folk think you've been talking shite 😂

This is looking like the easiest title win of my lifetime! Is it cold in our shadow huns?
Cannot wait for this tonight! Perfect way to make up for missing out on Manchester 🍀
Friday night football returns, should be a weekly occurrence!
Wonder how many folk thought we would only lose 3 games in that group. Next year is the year
Well played Celtic 👏👏. Should have won it right enough, missed chances again!
Played well there, need to take our chances at this level though
Fancied our chances all week which probably means we'll get a tanking 🙈
Fuck right off Liverpool

@Trundle14 from our worst 45 minutes of the season to arguably our best 😂
There are nae words to describe how much I love the Celtic 💚💚💚

This Newcastle game 😳😳😳
